definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
silver halide (usually chloride) used to fix photos

sentences.english: The calculated results of energy gap on alkaline earth mixed halides are reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 對鹼土金屬復鹵化物的能隙進行了計算，結果合理。

sentences.english: A typical example is the halogenation of a hydrocarbon.
sentences.chinese: 典型的例子是碳氫化合物的鹵化。

sentences.english: Polymers of vinyl chloride or of other halogenated olefins, in primary forms.
sentences.chinese: 初級形狀的氯乙烯或其他鹵化烯烴聚合物。

sentences.english: The photographic elements contain a blue-sensitive hydrophilic colloid silver halide emulsion layer.
sentences.chinese: 照像材料含有親水膠體的感藍鹵化銀滷劑層。

sentences.english: The silver halide fibers were made by means of hot extrusion.
sentences.chinese: 採用熱擠壓法成型製備出鹵化銀多晶光纖。

sentences.english: It contains halides used for rinsing processes.
sentences.chinese: 含有鹵化物，用於水洗製程。

sentences.english: Finally, the various production methods of halogenated paraffins were briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 最後對鹵化石蠟的生產方法進行了簡要介紹。

sentences.english: Silver halide are photosensitive materials extensively used as source materials in photographic films.
sentences.chinese: 鹵化銀是一種光敏性極高的材料。

sentences.english: Many microorganisms possess the ability to dehydrohalogenate DDT to DDE.
sentences.chinese: 許多微生物使滴滴涕脫鹵化氫變爲滴滴依。

sentences.english: The method can also be used for the calculations of the phonon dispersions of other alkali halides.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法還可用於其它鹼金屬鹵化物聲子譜的計算。

sentences.english: Alkyl halides are reacted with sodium nitrite .
sentences.chinese: 鹵化烷與亞硝酸鈉反應。

sentences.english: The start-up process is complex because of the characteristic of metal halide lamp.
sentences.chinese: 金屬鹵化物燈因其自身特性，它的啓動過程比較複雜。

sentences.english: It is confirmed that iridium ion dopants in the crystals act as electron traps.
sentences.chinese: 進一步說明了銥在鹵化銀晶體中的電子陷阱作用。

sentences.english: At first, the effect of dye adsorption on the structure of silver halide microcrystals is studied.
sentences.chinese: 首先研究了染料吸附對鹵化銀微晶結構的影響。
